title: Software Engineer Interview
Interview Descriptions: 7 interviews over 8 hours and 100 question quiz at the end. If you get less then 70% you don't get the position. Then after that you get flown to India for a meeting with the CEO
Interview Questions: How did you solve that puzzle?

title: Recruiter Interview
Interview Descriptions: A recruiter is responsible for finding and hiring the right talent for a company. This involves sourcing, screening, and interviewing candidates, as well as working with hiring managers to understand their staffing needs and develop effective recruitment strategies.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: Technician Interview
Interview Descriptions: Easy and effective and quick I didn’t find anything hard you can talk to them freely and very easy What are you strengths Weakness What do you like to do for fun Can you work these hours
Interview Questions: What do you like to do for fun

title: Analyst Interview
Interview Descriptions: Straightforward and average difficulty but I enjoyed the interview. They asked me a multitude of questions but I was able to answer each and every one to the best of my ability.
Interview Questions: Describe a difficult situation you faced at work and how you dealt with it.

title: Janitor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Was okay, given mop and told to do a bit. They were fairly happy so they hired me on the spot there and then. Started the following Monday. Easiest interview I've had
Interview Questions: What's the hardest thing you've ever had to clean?

title: IT Specialist Interview
Interview Descriptions: Nice people relaxed easy-going very informative, nice atmosphere good people please campus, very informative. Went into detail about the job walked around the campus showed the ins and outs of the building

title: Yes! Agent Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at YES in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Good process made it good by easy. Thankful for the opportunity and experience. Hoping next ones are as good and as simple as that. Now all we can do is hope for the next one

title: Design Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at YES
Interview Descriptions: Interview is real cover most basic, sv, uvm, vetilog.  Did you know sva, Perl scripting. What is makefile..? Same hr questions.. Ask about collage life, what is you final project. How it help to understand..?

title: Teaching Helper Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at YES (Sioux Falls, SD) in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: Filled out questionnaire, talked with manager, drug and back ground test. They hurried me through as they needed more people to help. they also had very few males that helped out so that may have helped me as well. This interview was fine, basically wanted to know that I could handle myself and not get too frustrated.
Interview Questions: Have you ever worked with kids before

title: Kernel BSP Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at YES (Bengaluru) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: C, Device Drivers, Linux Kernel, Board Support Package, Assmbley Language, 8086 instructions, operating system, data structures, trees, graphs, stacks, queus, They asked questions on Device drives, BSP, 8086 assmbley Instructions. around 1 hour of Interview. personal intrests, hobbies
